严肃的猴子生意：通过数码相机检查黑猩猩心脏世界上第一个通过数码相机测量黑猩猩心率的实验可能有助于抑制圈养类人猿的心血管疾病，并为了解它们的大脑如何从幼年开始发育提供有价值的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Serious-monkey-business-Chimpanzee-heart-check-via-digital-camera.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Serious-monkey-business-Chimpanzee-heart-check-via-digital-camera.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a664122d-cb36-4890-8fa1-7d8c087f71e0 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 09:49:00 -0400 Serious monkey business: Chimpanzee heart check via digital camera
生命早期肠道菌群可能在幼年特发性关节炎中发挥作用在被诊断出患有儿童风湿病之前十多年前，患有这种疾病的儿童的肠道菌群在几个方面与保持健康的儿童不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Early-life-gut-flora-may-play-a-role-in-juvenile-idiopathic-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Early-life-gut-flora-may-play-a-role-in-juvenile-idiopathic-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07511a11-95a5-4666-90e7-a41b7c0c9232 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 07:55:00 -0400 Early life gut flora may play a role in juvenile idiopathic arthritis

患者们因谁应该为昂贵的输液药物付费而陷入争论健康保险公司和医疗服务提供者正在争论谁应该为患者提供高成本的输液药物，利润之争现在已经蔓延到全国各地的州议会大厦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Patients-squeezed-in-fight-over-who-gets-to-bill-for-pricey-infusion-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Patients-squeezed-in-fight-over-who-gets-to-bill-for-pricey-infusion-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f32f99b-bffb-42b8-b7aa-be6cc3027396 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 06:36:00 -0400 Patients squeezed in fight over who gets to bill for pricey infusion drugs
